title: Revenue of the global eSports market 2012 to 2022
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 8 data points.
In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2012 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2019, and finally roughly increasing from 2019 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2019 and 2022.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 1790.0 was reported at Year 2022
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 130.0 was reached at Year 2012
